name: Lilly Lashes Faux 3D Lashes
about: What it is:An exclusive collection of lashes that feature wispy and fluttery design along with semi-dramatic to dramatic length and volume..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:All lashes are waterproof and with proper care can be used up to 25 times.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Step 1: Carefully remove the lashes from the tray sweeping under the lash and using a lash applicator to lightly grip lash band. Gently lift the band away from the tray, never pulling on the lashes..Step 2: Hold the lash up to your eye to measure for sizing. If the lash is longer than your natural eye shape, use lash scissors to trim the lash accordingly. Conservatively trim from the inner or outer corner..Step 3: Once your desired length is established, use a lash applicator to gently hold lash and apply a thin layer of lash adhesive on the lash band (allow it to dry for 30 seconds)..Step 4: Once the lash adhesive is tacky, use the lash applicator to carefully place the lash evenly to the middle of the eye lid, as close as possible to the lash line. Once comfortably applied to lash line, use lash applicator to ensure lash is firmly attached to both inner and outer part of the eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited when I found out that I would get the chance to try these lashes! When it comes to my  eye shape(almond) and lash style I tend to gravitate more towards lashes that are going to give me a lot of length and some volume. In the past I haven’t had the greatest experience with faux mink  lashes as I found them to be very delicate and not as sustainable to work with  so I was curious to see how these hold up. Not only did 34th street suit my eyes, it gave me just the right amount of volume and length without looking over done! I know that faux mink lashes are usually more delicate than the usual lashes but I had no problem taking them off the packaging.Usually when I’m applying false lashes I have to cut and adjust the lashes to my liking/eye shape but these went on and fit my eyes so nicely, I didn’t need to make any adjustments! Considering how I haven’t worn false strip lashes in a while, (and I’m not the best at applying them), I was dreading the idea of putting on these strip lashes but after applying some glue to the lash band,  they popped on so easily! I was pleasantly surprised and happy how light weight  these lashes were. One of the deterrents for me with wearing strip lashes is how heavy they start to feel however these didn’t feel heavy at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the 34th Street & Ala Moana but I was not able to select either type I tried- both sets show in pic. I’ve actually never tried this brand even though I love falsies. They feel feather light on your eyes & stay all day with a good glue! I’m normally a Duo fan but def give the Lilly glue a try bc I liked it better! I don’t really know my eye type but both sets were very complimentary! The Ala Moana set looked very dramatic even though the box claims they are a medium volume lash to give a “natural, wispy look.” I wore these as a witch for Halloween. I found the 34th Street brand to be more natural looking on me even though it’s box states it’s a “wispy double-layered lash to add more length & glam.” I wore this more natural looking set on Thanksgiving. The boxes they came in are super sturdy and cute- they can hold up to 3 sets of lashes each! They are also vegan which hopefully also means cruelty free. Even though I love both sets, I could only see myself repurchasing for special occasions due to the high price tag. I get why they’re so expensive because they hold their shape and with that thick/sturdy band they could easily be reused the 25 times mentioned on the box. I just feel I could purchase cheaper pairs for everyday, reuse as much as possible, then repeat for less than the cost of these lashes but I have to admit these are so fire.

reviews.review_text: I received these free for review. This claims to be triple layered for dramatic ultimate glam. I personally like the flared look of them being longer and thicker at the ends. I like the thick band that helps with creating a crease on monolids. They bend to the curve of your eye very easily . I've only tried drugstore lashes before. These are definitely a quality pair. The faux mink look very much like normal lash hair. I can only attest to one wear, but they look nicely even. These are very very long lashes. There's no denying that these look like obvious falsies when wearing them. Most likely great for a photoshoot but not day to day wear. For lashes, they are quite on the pricey side. I hope they withstand multiple uses. Packaging is very nice with magnetic closure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are actually pretty phenomenal lashes. They blend well with my really lashes and the quality is fantastic!!! 34th Street have the most perfect shape and curl to them (perfect wisp).  They are lightweight so wearing them all day doesn’t feel like a chore (all you frequent lash wearers get what I mean). I typically wear magnetic lashes but I’m not lying when I say the Lilly Lashes adhesive is a dream to apply.  It is a beautiful black brush on adhesive that these lashes hold onto very well.  I have sensitive eyes and some products can irritate them after a few hours of wear and this did not irritate or bother my eyes at all. I was able to get about 20 wears out of these with proper care. 10/10 will be purchasing more of these lashes and adhesive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lash style as well as the Powell Street, and I love them both! This style gives a lot of volume, bold, and glam. I wore these on outings that I really wanted to make a statement. As for the Powell street, I can wear these for an everyday look and they don’t fall short in the glam department either.   Also, I did not have much trouble applying the lashes, and this is coming from a rookie (lol). I would definitely recommend these lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are amazing full lashes! They feel so real and look absolutely flawless. For me, these are more for going out because I like more subtle lashes but they would be my number 1 choice for a night on the town!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

These lashes can be worn several times, and they have held up great in my opinion so you definitely get your moneys worth. The lashes are a tad long but they stay on well and look beautiful on. Definitely recommend trying them out!

reviews.review_text: I like the collab with Sephora and Lilly lashes but I’m not going to lie and say that I like these as much as Lilly lashes on their own. I like the price and they’re still great lashes. However, I think the band is a little thinner and they don’t seem as long and full as the ones I am used to. I think if you’re just starting to get into super dramatic lashes without going all the way then these are would be perfect for you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best thing about these is their longevity. I have been testing them extensively, and I have worn them 18 times so far and they’re still going strong. That’s something extremely important to be personally because I need that bang for my buck. They’re comfortable, with the band needing just a touch of time to “break in” if you will. If you want voluminous drama? These are for you. They are not “my lashes but better” (which I’m sure isn’t really the goal when lookin at this collection).  They’re really beautiful for hooded eyes due to the slight flair in the middle as well as the outer corner, and that was a huge plus for me when it comes to the 34th street pair. I personally didn’t have to cut them to size, but I do have huge eyes that probably look like a Sesame Street character to many. Now, the dramatic look I mentioned? It’s very apparent on hooded eyes. This is where the slight issue comes in—they’re so full that they constantly flap onto the hood of my eyes. That’s a me problem, technically, but it’s something I feel other hooded beauties might need to know before they purchase them just in case we’re total twinsies.  All in all, I’ve enjoyed these. They’re dramatic and fun, and the longevity is top notch. I’d absolutely recommend them to those who love to add a little spice to their lash game.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes were so beautiful and intricate looking. I first wore these to a masquerade party and they held up so amazingly well with the glue provided (also Lilly Lashes) and also wore them with different looks I created (a Sea siren, a countess, Queen vampire, ancient Egyptian-esque, I honestly prefer them to any lashes I have tried. Expensive, but you get the multiple wears and reliable quality time after time. I don't want to waste any more money trying to find lashes on par to Lillys, I know I'm getting the quality I need!10/10

reviews.review_text: Okay, so I’ll start by saying that I only ever wear false lashes when I’m taking photos and I’ve never worn any as big as these ones so it took a bit of getting used to. My go-to lashes are individual lashes which are DEFINITELY not on the same fullness level as these, so you can probably understand my slight shock at how big these ones seem on my eyes lol. However, I love the slightly tapered shape of the Beverly Drive lashes and I think they’re gorgeous! I don’t know how often I’ll wear them because they are way too full for me unless I’m doing a costume or a ~~look~~ that requires big lashes, but I do like them for that purpose. If you like full lashes, I’d definitely recommend these ones because they don’t feel particularly heavy on the eye despite their fullness and the quality is really good. reviews.review_text: I’ve wanted to try Lilly lashes for years now but never did because they are kinda pricey. I will say after trying them the quality and texture of the actual hairs is amazing! They aren’t the heaviest lashes I’ve worn but you’ll definitely feel them and be very aware that you’re wearing them especially if you aren’t used to wearing dramatic lashes (or lashes period). I don’t recommend for everyday/natural looks (unless dramatic IS your everyday look). These will be great for special occasions, holidays, etc.

reviews.review_text: I have tried many of the cheaper false eyelash options (as well as a handful of magnetic lash options), and these Lilly Lashes were as easy to put on as my magnetic lashes. This is due to one of the lashes’ biggest pros and cons to them - the band is really thick (about twice the width of a Kiss lash if not more so). It does make the band pretty obvious at the inner corner of my eye.  However, unlike all of the other large lashes I have tried before, these did not overwhelm my face! I was *shocked* that these were well balanced, still allowed my eyeshadow look to shine (and made it look that much better).  Overall, I would highly recommend these if you need a dramatic lash and do not mind splurging to get a nice pair to reuse.

reviews.review_text: I love the quality of these lashes. I feel like Lilly lashes has got the right idea on quality lashes. They fit my eyes perfectly. I have smaller eyes so sometimes it’s hard to find a brand that offers styles that look good.

reviews.review_title: You WILL regret not trying these.
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: WOW. I’m honestly speechless. As someone with stick-straight lashes, I’ve always gone to falsies to make my eyes pop (and make me look a little more alive lol!) and I can honestly say these are BY FAR the highest quality lashes I have ever worn. For context, my eyes are smaller, so I trim my lashes to fit my shape and size. These worked perfectly, even when trimmed. I bought another pair to cut up (and use like individual lashes) and that worked phenomenally too! They are so versatile, extremely voluminous, and don’t need any mascara on top- they’re beautiful all on their own!!! The band is very good quality, the lashes don’t fall off the band or slide around like some cheaper brands, and they feel and look totally real. 10/10! GET. THESE. LASHES.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Im obsessed with Lilly lashes, they are my favorite lash brand. I really love how light they feel on my eyes and how they make my eyes pop. They’re the perfect length for my taste, I am so happy I received these from influenster to test. I received Beverly Drive and Powell Street and also a mini size Lilly Lash adhesive. If you love flare lashes that are wispy with a lot of volume, then I definitely recommend Beverly Drive and if you love round, medium to long length with some volume and curl, then I would recommend Powell Street. I can’t say enough good things about these lashes. I think Lilly Lashes are literally the best lash brand out there right now.

reviews.review_title: The most flattering lashes out there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best lashes out there!!!!!  Lilly lashes were always my favorite go to lash brand! They have very bendable band, soft and easy to apply, i need to cut the lash in the outer corner for a bit, it’s the perfect length, they are round lashes which a great option for hooded eyes friends! They are extremely luxurious, and they are faux mink! They feel so light when you have them on! 100% recommended

reviews.review_text: I have both the Ala Moana and 34th Street and it's easy to say I'm in love. They went on easy enough for someone who is still learning to perfect wearing lashes and I didn't need to cut them to fit my hooded eyes which was super nice. I love their length and how beautiful they look, making my eye color really pop. They really can go with any makeup style from every day to something fun. I also like the box they come in a lot, it's very sturdy and the magnetic lid is a nice touch. I'm excited to wear them again.
